mapper.select: SELECT p.certificate_type_id cardtype, p.certificate_no cardno, p.birth birth, p.age age, p.sex sex, c.id caseid, c.ajmc casename, s.person_id serid, p.`name` sername, p.address address, a.id areaid, a.`name` areaname FROM ba_serial s, ba_case c, ba_person p, ba_area a WHERE s.case_id = c.id AND s.area_id = a.id AND s.person_id = p.id AND s.id = #{ serid }
